adHeader: Top Notch Math Tutor! Ivy League Graduate
adDetails: Hello! My name is Josh. I am confident you will not find a better math tutor on Craigslist. My students range from those who struggle to those who excel, and have gone on to top universities including Caltech, Yale, The University of Chicago, and UPenn. Credentials -Proofread economic models for Booth School of Business -Education Consultant for the Chicago Public Schools -Taught honors and AP Calculus in a classroom setting -ISACS New Teacher Institute Certified -Twice taught elementary and middle school teachers math Under University of Chicago's VIGRE program -Reviewed NASA educational materials If you would like to learn more about my service and background, check out my website! HolisticMathTutor.com Chicago Public Schools hired me to design the curricula for Algebra, Trigonometry, Precalculus, and AP Calculus (my syllabus being approved by the College Board). I'm available to tutor those courses as well as: Business Calculus Financial Mathematics Basic Real Analysis/Topology Multivariable/Vector Calculus Linear Algebra Logic, Set Theory, and basic proof-based math (which pretty much everything past calculus is) Discrete Mathematics Elementary Game Theory (Theoretical and Economically oriented) Probability Theory AP Physics/College 1st year physics Standardized Test Preps (AP, SAT, ACT, GRE/GMAT quantitative etc.) and test taking strategies Graphing Calculator Help Independent Study I can fill out study guides, give you crash courses, and more!
